articles.description: Humane, a startup backed by Sam Altman, will be releasing its first-ever AI Pin with unique artificial intelligence features.
articles.content: Tech startup firm Humane, backed by OpenAI CEO Sam Altman, is all set to release its first project since the inception of the company. Humane will be launching the unique Ai Pin, a wearable gadget in… [+2072 chars]
